title: "Buddha" extra bold high contrast serif face
content:
Hi, does anyone know what font this might be?  
thanks in advance

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [buddha.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202005855/http:/typophile.com/files/buddha_1.jpg) | 806.24 KB |
author: kelakegan

comments.content:
Hm, that's a tough one, as the type is blurry, bent, shaded, and filled with a gradient. It's in the same style as [Trooper Roman](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202005855/http:/typophile.com/node/29304), but not quite. I'll see if [Rookledge](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202005855/http:/www.amazon.com/Rookledges-Classic-International-Typefinder-Christopher/dp/1856694062)'s provides any solace.

In the meantime, maybe check this handy FontList of [Extra Bold High Contrast Serif Faces](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202005855/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontlist/genres/extra_bold_high_contrast_serifs/).
